title: Designing objects that tell stories
description: Designer Yves Béhar digs up his creative roots to discuss some of the iconic objects he's created (the Leaf lamp, the Jawbone headset). Then he turns to the witty, surprising, elegant objects he's working on now -- including the "$100 laptop."
author: Yves Béhar
keywords: TED, talks, business, computers, creativity, design, sex, society
